commentText:
Obtain a {@link GsonBuilder} which Base64-encodes {@code byte[]}_properties when reading and writing JSON._

A custom {@link com.google.gson.TypeAdapter} will be registered via_{@link GsonBuilder#registerTypeHierarchyAdapter(Class, Object)} which_serializes a {@code byte[]} property to and from a Base64-encoded String_instead of a JSON array._

NOTE: Use of this option requires the presence of the_Apache Commons Codec library on the classpath when running on Java 6 or 7._On Java 8, the standard {@link java.util.Base64} facility is used instead.
codeText: public static GsonBuilder gsonBuilderWithBase64EncodedByteArrays() {_		_		Base64Utils.encode(null)___		_		GsonBuilder builder = new GsonBuilder()__		builder.registerTypeHierarchyAdapter(byte[].class, new Base64TypeAdapter())__		return builder__	}
